meanings.definition: The art or craft of making objects from silver.
meanings.sent1: Silversmithing requires skill and patience to shape silver into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent2: I admire the intricate designs created through silversmithing.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedian try silversmithing? He wanted to make some 'silver' jokes!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like silversmithing, carefully crafting each sentence to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The silversmithing workshop was filled with the gentle sound of hammers shaping silver.

meanings.definition: The work or products of a silversmith.
meanings.sent1: The display showcased the finest silversmithing pieces from different artisans.
meanings.sent2: Collectors value authentic silversmithing for its quality and craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The silversmithing on display glittered like a treasure trove under the lights.
meanings.sent4: His words were a masterpiece of silversmithing, each one polished to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The history museum featured a special exhibit on the evolution of silversmithing.
